item.title: La-Z-Boy launches ‘never recline’ petition for airplane passenger seats—and it’s closing in on 200,000 signatures
item.description: Petition signers can win a free recliner and $500 toward a flight.

item.description: The stress test has helped banks more than double their capital levels over the past decade-plus.

item.description: Some federal agencies were skeptical that allowing a Japanese company to buy an American steelmaker would create national security risks.

item.title: Republicans have clawed back more IRS tax-cheat enforcement funds. For now.
Scientist says the one thing everyone hates about AI is ultimately what helped him win a Nobel Prize
item.description: In October, David Baker was the only American scientist to win the Nobel Prize in Chemistry.
